amendment.description: To allow the importation by individuals of safe and affordable drugs from Canada.

action.text: Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator McCain.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2107, under the order of 5/23/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 54. Record Vote Number: 108.
